meanings.sent1: The birthday card was treaclier than a lollipop.
meanings.sent2: Her treaclier tone made everyone feel warm inside.
meanings.sent3: The treaclier movie made even the toughest guy shed a tear.
meanings.sent4: His treaclier words dripped with honeyed sweetness.
meanings.sent5: The treaclier sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and gold.

meanings.sent1: The treaclier syrup flowed slowly down the pancake stack.
meanings.sent2: The treaclier mud made it hard to walk through the field.
meanings.sent3: The treaclier glue took forever to dry on the paper.
meanings.sent4: Her treaclier voice stuck in his mind like thick syrup.
meanings.sent5: The treaclier texture of the pudding was like eating a sweet cloud.
